bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, aero tube shape, compact race design, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ custom Venge top cap
S-Works ProSet stem, 7050 3D-forged with carbon-clip front cap/cone, 4-degree shim, CNC head bolts
Campagnolo Super Record Ultra Torque, carbon/Ti, 11-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
S-Works Turbo tubular w/ BlackBelt, 290TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
S-Works Turbo tubular w/ BlackBelt, 290TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Pro, carbon rails, 143mm
S-Works Venge FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
Carbon chainstay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
